## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have removed any console.logs or debugging code

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested the changes in multiple browsers (if applicable)
- [ ] I have tested the changes on mobile devices (if applicable)

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the README.md (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated the SETUP_GUIDE.md (if needed)
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments for new functions

### Database & Migrations
- [ ] I have created necessary database migrations (if applicable)
- [ ] I have tested migrations both up and down (if applicable)
- [ ] I have updated the Prisma schema (if applicable)

### Security
- [ ] I have reviewed my changes for security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have not exposed any sensitive information (API keys, passwords, etc.)
- [ ] I have validated all user inputs (if applicable)
- [ ] I have implemented proper authorization checks (if applicable)

### Breaking Changes
- [ ] This PR does not introduce breaking changes
- [ ] OR: I have documented all breaking changes in the description above
- [ ] OR: I have updated the migration guide (if applicable)
